About me

iyanuokeowo.com is the digital epicentre of my life’s work and passion. I'm Iyanuoluwa, I'm a Web engineer with ability to learn and collaborate in rapidly changing environments and compositions. worked through 500 hours of bootcamp structure, learning Javascript, html, css, Node.js, react and python , django. Eager to tackle web development/design challenges to achieve lasting impacts on user experience.

I am a very ambitious person who loves to work on making the website work well. Working on the web is my passion as I love to work on exciting projects. I'm Adept at collaborating with dynamic teams to build high-quality websites and identify opportunities to enhance the user experience.

work with me

Do you have a question, or perhaps you’re seeking advice or insights related to the tech industry? Don’t hesitate to reach out. I’m always open to engaging in meaningful conversations and assisting in any way I can. Whether it’s a query about one of my ventures, a speaking engagement, an investment opportunity, or simply a tech-related question, I’m here to help.

You can contact me through the ‘Contact’ section on iyanuokeowo.com or connect with me on my social media platforms – LinkedIn, Twitter, and facebook. I look forward to hearing from you and embarking on this tech-driven journey together. Let’s connect and shape the future of technology.
